citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12pm on
10-Oct-19.
Called the facility owner and she stated that she was at work and her daughter was out of town.

narrative:
